attributes.action: UK to hold a National Thank our NHS & Social Care staff Day.
attributes.additional_details: Simply because this is the right thing to do to recognize the dedication our NHS and Social care worker have while carrying out their work, and the selflessness they show towards their patients even if it means risking their own lives. To remember those who have died during this difficult period on the front line. to never forget what they have done.
attributes.background: I want Government to implement a National Thank our NHS and Social care staff day to acknowledge and remember what they have sacrificed and achieved during the Covid 19 period. especially when risking their own lives to treat and support patients, while not having protective equipment.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303882

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
